author: Jaquelyn Lowe
comment: App harassed me with notifications to turn on my location setting constantly, if I turned it off. I turn off my location all the time to save my battery and this app would not stop sending me notifications every few seconds even after I took away all its permissions and ability to draw over other apps and send notifications.  I have no idea what this app even did for my watch anyway, so good riddance.

author: Nathan Keck
comment: Setting and tweaking the watch face is quick and easy.  Watch faces are prominent and easy to navigate.  Settings are simple and to the point.  There are never too many details to have to consider, which can sometimes lead to customization overload.  All in all, ZW Manager is a highly effective app for customizing the ZenWatch 2.

author: Jo James
comment: Newest update=BRUTAL! Aside from the restrictions to use my watch into the evening because my battery now gets completely drained, even though I used to be able to go two days, the entire set up is now a joke. How did I go from an awesome watch with easy navigation and convenient controls, to the invasive features of being able to change my watch face and having to take multiple steps to access simple features? Please fix! Don't make me resort to the fruit variety.

author: Pauline Mulpeter
comment: Since. Update to android 2.0 cannot open this app? Keeps saying to update but not telling you were? I unstalled re install WHY IS MY WATCH SAYING ITS ACTIVE EVEN DO ITS NOT INSTALLED

author: Silvia Gondarova
comment: After the new update I can not connect at all anyhow watch with my Asus phone at all. ZenWatch manager get stuck and there is no Bluetooth option on watch after reset. Battery dead and no change to set up it, so I can throw them now, good! Choose different brand

Baaad Battery consumer.   Uninstall it.   The day I installed it gave it 5stars. For the style of app design and watch faces.  It swallows the battery backup so fast. From 40 hours backup to 4 hours. I tried everything, finally had to unpair, uninstall and pair it again.  Asus has to do something about this. Its bad for the reputation of the watch.

author: Matthew M
comment: I've had the Asus 3 watch for a few months now and it's perfect. Especially for the harsh winters. Talking to my watch to send messages by via text or Facebook messenger is a tech's dream.

author: sheng ah
comment: I was unhappy for the android wear updare 1.5 to 2.0 on my new asus zenwatch 3 after i bought it for 5day. Now after the update some of the features like ZenWatch manager, zenwatch remote & facedesign cannot be install to the watch. Cannot copy google account to watch, therefore play store on watch doesn't work. Eventhought google play music doesn't exit anymore on the watch. New gorgeous watch because an update felt like less features..... Pls fix this matter asap.  If not the watch not worthy for me any more. Fed up with this problem.

author: Cesar Mir
comment: I purchased this watch as a trial and now i can't leave home without it. In addition to the look and feel of the Azus app and the build quality of the Zenwatch 2 I had to contact the service department who inmediately jumped into action and resolved my issues. I will continue to support Azus and its products.

author: Alvin Hurt
comment: This app works really well and has a lot of neat features. The only thing I think could be better is the phone to watch connect during calls. It seems a little slow connecting to the phone.

author: Kristen Hanson
comment: I'm very confused as to why the watch was amazing and then I update to have less??? I loved my watch before and even talked others into buying it over other watches and then I update my watch and loose everything I use to brag about. Now I'm trying to change alarms that I set so easily before and I can't even find the alarm setting! Bring back the old version it was a million times better.

author: joshua reedy
comment: Updates just keeping raising the bar on disappointment. I feel like someone just broke my $200 watch and I never even got to meet them.
The permissions required are beyond intrusive. You dont need to know what I had for lunch or how it taste .
title: Garbage

comment: To install the Zenwatch 2 on a different device, the watch must be reset, which means erased of all downloaded watch faces.... Not to mention it takes a rediculously long yime to reset it. Then, once it's finally up and running, it takes an act of congress to find all your watch faces again and reinstal them because even though these are already on your phone, they are not recognized so you have to download them from the watch. This wasn't the case when I bought the watch but only after a forced update. Thanks Asus and gooe for making my life even more difficult. If I didn't spend $200+ on this watch, it would be in the garbage.

This app has hardly anything not already offered by Android wear. Considering how long Asus took to deliver 2.0 support it is frankly disappointing to see the result. In typical Asus fashion the hardware, Zenwatch 2 for me is the 🌟 of the show. It's app is blah

author: Mark Young
comment: Improving after Android Wear 2.0 update.  Asus was really stupid for deploying that to our ZenWatch 2.0 watches before it was ready -- my watch was useless for about 2 months.  Many apps are working, again -- except text messaging apps I was using (one from Google).  When I changed the font to get a watch face to display the time correctly, it made the on-screen keyboard too small (but now usable with effort).  If I didn't have another Android Wear watch (Sony SmartWatch 3.0) to wear in the mean time, this whole experience would have been extremely unworkable -- and I would have bought one.  Hope they go back to 1.0.  Probably, I would have to seriously think about ever buying a watch from them, again!  The initial experience was great with 1.0 -- but deploying 2.0 well before it was ready was crippling -- and I very much wonder about Asus's judgement.
What happen to to the swipe to contacts and flick the wrist to apps.... Come on this is bad... I didn't spend 200 dollars for this.. Go back to the old format.

author: Filipe Governa
comment: Not bad, but no full-color ambient mode, doesn't vibrate hourly, can't set weather location manually, smartwatch notifications often make it vibrate but show nothing unless you tap the smartwatch, and developer dropped support for ZenWatch 3 after barely 1 year.

author: paul prochnow
comment: Will NOT find cell phone...it did at one timeand was far from good. YET with a better phone things improved overall.

author: Rohit Gandhi
comment: It's too slow. Says no space avl. Good looks is not the only thing to buy watch.

author: Nertz
comment: I'm with others on this.  After the update there are to many steps to access things that was super easy before and not going to talk about how the battery life has gone down. Wish I could go back to 1.0

author: Sachin Jagtap
comment: Nice app. But recently after i update the app, i lost customization menu from my app. Unable to customise anything now.

author: Caylan Mcmullan
comment: Recently there have been connecting issues. And the last update kills the battery, if the watch connects to my phone.

author: clinton beetham
comment: Using One Plus 3, zenwatch manager is not getting connected to the watch.

author: Jonathan Avery
comment: -_-_-it won't let me Bluetooth to my phone anymore I use to make calls from my watch an answer calls wat do I do

author: GARRY WHYTE
comment: Site is full of fake reviews. Not impressed with such a big company allowing or capitulating.

Asus is to be commended for their support for Android watches and the Android wear platform.  This program brings great features to the user and makes the watch a pleasure to use.  I get many compliments about my watch and I am quick to share my pride and passion for the Android wear platform.  Please keep up the great work!

author: Rob S
comment: 1 - screen time out setting doesnt work, no matter what i set it to, it times out after 3 secs 2 - i did a custom watch face but cant figure out how to apply it, i selected apply but it did not  and not an issue but would like more watch faces

author: Ed Guyer
comment: Since the last firmware update the watch has been come useless.  Pairing request multiple times a day and continuous reset to keep it working.  Fitbit here I come.

author: Alan Fox
comment: Hasn't been as good since Android Wear 2.0 was installed. Quite disappointed.

author: Mark Farrell
comment: Broke - software won't connect to watch due to bug - screen checkbox to connect isn't responding, as if lower right touch area not responsive, not affecting other apps

author: Zhiliang Wang
comment: I liked it before upgrade d to AW2.0,  now it is so buggy, the most issue is I can not relying on the notification any more, it kept asking pairing, may be it is because google, but Asus need do something.

author: Rebecca Conerty
comment: I'm disappointed that there is just not enough girly apps that have the walking and Battery ec. that you can actually read.

author: Larry Foose
comment: After a brief tutorial my watch was up and running with some crazy cool watch faces! Set and forget... the way an app should run.

author: Duane Dent
comment: It's really not all that useful. Why would I want to use this over the regular Android Wear app?

author: Jason Edgar
comment: On my third warranty replacement for the ZenWatch 2... The terrible support has turned me off what used to be one of my favorite tech companies. I won't buy their gear anymore

author: Craig K
comment: Good added functionality along with some decent watchfaces. In my experience doesn't change battery performance either.

author: Rito Alvarez
comment: I like changing the watch face alot. Zen watch manager makes it so much easier. Thanks

author: Sean C
comment: Since the update to v2, I have lost the ability to use OK Google. This needs to be fixed, or allow a downgrade of the watch

author: Dylan Winspear
comment: It works very well I just wish that on the watch swiping left and right didn't change the face you should have to hold down to change it it gets annoying when I try to use gestures for other apps and my watch face changes
